oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kitāb Nihāyat al-marām : manuscript, 1600
Nihāyat al-marām
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ʻĀmilī, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī , 1539 or 1540-1600
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: According to colophon (f. 143r), copy completed in the hand of al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Khurāsānī towards the end of Dhū al-Ḥijjah 1008 AH [July 1600 AD].
Ownership statement signed al-Khūrī Yūsuf Abī Ṣaʻb and dated 1960.
Cream laid paper. 26.8 x 17.5 cm. (19.5 x 11 cm.).
Written in one column, 25 lines per page, in black and red.
Bound in soft brown leather without boards.
MS Arab 221. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
